issue.title: Allow to choose the widgets that can be added to a window via menu option

content.raw:
@chapulina the PR worked on with the initial layout like a charm, thanks! It seems however that we miss those options after saving them. As an example, we started with the following config:

```
<?xml version="1.0"?>

<window>
  <state></state>
  <position_x>278</position_x>
  <position_y>172</position_y>
  <width>1328</width>
  <height>730</height>
  <stylesheet>
    /* We need an empty stylesheet so that it loads the system's default style */
  </stylesheet>
  <menus>
    <plugins from_paths="false">
      <show>TeleopWidget</show>
      <show>TopicViewer</show>
      <show>TopicsStats</show>
      <show>Responder</show>
      <show>Requester</show>
    </plugins>
  </menus>
</window>

<plugin filename="RenderWidget"/>
<plugin filename="TopicsStats"/>
<plugin filename="TopicViewer"/>
```

but after saving it we get:
```
<?xml version="1.0"?>

<window>
  <state></state>
  <position_x>278</position_x>
  <position_y>172</position_y>
  <width>1328</width>
  <height>730</height>
  <stylesheet>

    /* We need an empty stylesheet so that it loads the system's default style */
    </stylesheet>
</window>
<plugin filename="RenderWidget"/>
<plugin filename="TopicsStats"/>
<plugin filename="TopicViewer"/>
```
